mapper.sql: COI_NUM, CUI_NUM, REI_NUM, SUB_NUM, COI_CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(COI_CREDAT,'%Y-%m-%d')AS COI_CREDAT, TIME_FORMAT(COI_CRETIM,'%H:%i:%s') AS COI_CRETIM, DATE_FORMAT(COI_MODDAT,'%Y-%m-%d')AS COI_MODDAT, TIME_FORMAT(COI_MODTIM,'%H:%i:%s') AS COI_MODTIM, (select CUI_ID from customer_info AS CUI WHERE CUI.CUI_NUM = COI.CUI_NUM) as CUI_ID, (select REI.REI_TITLE from review_info AS REI WHERE REI.REI_NUM = COI.REI_NUM) AS REI_TITLE, (select REL.REL_NAME from restaurant_list AS REL WHERE REL.rel_num = (select REI.rel_num from review_info AS REI WHERE REI.REI_NUM = COI.REI_NUM)) as REL_NAME
mapper.select: select COI_NUM, CUI_NUM, REI_NUM, SUB_NUM, COI_CONTENTS, COI_CREDAT, COI_CRETIM, COI_MODDAT, COI_MODTIM, (select CUI_ID from customer_info AS CUI WHERE CUI.CUI_NUM = COI.CUI_NUM) as CUI_ID, (select REI.REI_TITLE from review_info AS REI WHERE REI.REI_NUM = COI.REI_NUM) AS REI_TITLE from comment_info AS COI ORDER BY COI.REI_NUM
mapper.insert: insert into comment_info ( CUI_NUM, REI_NUM, SUB_NUM, COI_CONTENTS, COI_CREDAT, COI_CRETIM, COI_MODDAT, COI_MODTIM ) values ( #{cuiNum}, #{reiNum}, #{subNum}, #{coiContents}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%S'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%S') )
mapper.update:
update comment_info
COI_CONTENTS = #{coiContents}, COI_MODDAT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), COI_MODTIM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%S')
